title: Drawing, "Project for a wallpaper frieze", 1810–30
medium: Brush and orange and greenish black body colors on paper
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Rinceau formed by boughs with leaves and thorns in the shape of horizontal S, with blossoms in the hollows, over two bands. The upper one shows rosettes, the lower one fantastical floral motif.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a wallpaper frieze", 1810–30.
1810–30. Brush and orange and greenish black body colors on paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1914-21-54.
